description:
A local festival turns into a cork gun shootout, and there’s $100,000 prize for the last person standing. Later, after Nymph reveals her purpose for being on Earth, Ikaros finds herself on the edge of reverting to her former self.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Whom the Shooting Festival Is Held
Matsuri wa Ta ga Tame ni
血斗[マツリ]は誰がために
